{{Quote|All of you, show your respect to [[Gryff Whitehill]]. Fourthborn son of Lord [[Ludd Whitehill]] and commander of this garrison.|Harys to the inhabitants of [[Ironrath]].|The Sword in the Darkness}}
'''Harys''' is a man-at-arms sworn to [[House Whitehill]], and a member of [[Gryff Whitehill|Gryff Whitehill's]] garrison of [[Ironrath]].
sections.Biography:
==="[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"===
Harys arrives with Gryff at Ironrath late at night, and sets a cart on fire before introducing his commander. He and the and the other Whitehill soldiers then leave to quarter in the [[House Forrester|Forresters']] Great Hall.

[[File:TSITD_Harys_Watching_Soldiers.png|thumb|250px|left|Harys in Ironrath's Great Hall.]]Harys later watches as several members of the Whitehill garrison act out [[Ethan Forrester|Ethan Forrester's]] death at the hands of [[Ramsay Bolton|Ramsay Snow]], much to the dismay of his [[Elissa Forrester|mother]] and [[Rodrik Forrester|brother]]. This prompts Rodrik to angrily threaten or strike one of the soldiers, but Harys ends the confrontation before it escalates further, saying that Gryff will deal with the Forrester lord.

When Gryff brings out [[Talia Forrester]] to be punished for biting one of his men, he eventually punches Rodrik, knocking him onto the ground. [[Royland Degore]] is outraged by this, and threatens to attack the Whitehill soldiers. Should Rodrik allow him to do so, the [[Master-at-Arms|master-at-arms]] incapacitates two of the men before Harys knocks him down and disarms him. He then keeps Royland under guard for the rest of the confrontation.
